entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy

Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
